::Lord Elder::

After dealing with one of the Predacon fliers Elder continues on his way to Relay. Elder leaps onto the battlefield.

Elder: Lord Elder: MAXIMIZE!

Elder transforms and fires on Jotunn with two energy blats. He also opens a comm to Deadfur.

Elder: I'm here and engaging the Predacons!

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                               Deadfur: Razorwing, that you? This is not going well, we got this
 special kind of Preds, and I think even Lord Jotunn's here. I think he
 sent you a communication or something and... WHAT? YOU GOT GRIMLOCK
 HERE?!?!
 
 He ran over to the strategic command center.
 
 Deadfur: All fliers, stay clear from Grimlock. Risk of collateral
 damage, I repeat, Major risk of collateral damage! Lord Elder, please
 advise of your situation.
 
 ******
 
 In the air, Motherload wheeled about in the vain hope of avoiding the
 deadly jet of flame that Grimlock spewed forth. Too slow, the fire
 licked her side.
 
 Motherload: Ugh! My Lord, I request permission to deal with this fool
 myself!
 
 Jotunn had identified the warrior.
 
 Jotunn: Yes, that seems to be wise. But be careful Motherload, this is
 no ordinary Maximal. Bring me over this scorpion thing there first.
 
 He rose from his command seat and opened the hatch, the jumped off as
 she took him above Skorponok.
 
 Free to fight, Motherload transformed into a large armored bot and
 flew right at Grimlock, preparing to punch him right in the jaw...
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "khamkain" <khamkain@...> wrote:
 >
 > The situation was desastrous when Razorwing came out of the CR
 > chamber. Has Deadfur was trying to find him, Razorwing has come to his
 > final solution. Has he was typing on the computer, a CR chamber came
 > out of the celling with a bot in it. Has he entered is energy
 > signature, he turned out to the booting CR chamber. Has the bot step
 > out of the CR he said
 > 
 > - Grimlock ready! Grimlock wants to figth bad guys!
 > 
 > Razorwing : Well that's great my friend, cause we have a situation
 > called motherload rigth here.
 > 
 > Grimlock : Razorwing not worry Grimlock here now.
 > 
 > Has those deep word came out, Grimlock walk out of the command center.
 > As soon as he spoted motherload and the airtankers, he started firing
 > fireball at them.
 > 
 > Razorwing : Razorwing to Deadfur, we have a little backup. Sorry for
 > the delay. Whats the situation now?
 > 
 > 
 > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <warriorazure@> wrote:
 > >
 > > OOC: Lol! So true! Now who'll be the first for a Targetmaster? Or
 > > worse, a Powermaster!
 > > 
 > > BIC: 
 > > 
 > > As soon as Scorponok resurfaced, Deadfur received a report about it
 > > from one of the Ground crew.
 > > 
 > > Deadfur: Alright, Remus. You want your chance, there it is! Go! [To
 > > the command center] Can anybody get me Lord Razorwing?
 > > 
 > > But at the same time, the Airtankers arrived in visibility range of
 > > the city. The fliers, seeing the newcomers, moved in to intercept, but
 > > the attackers knew their stuff. Gunrain quickly dodged between the
 > > fliers and took out a lot of the defenders with his multiple guns,
 > > while Skysword did not even bother with dodging, rather preferring to
 > > ram and slice his opponents with his sharp wings. Bombtube took to the
 > > air, immediately attracting attention, but Lock-on gave him some cover
 > > with her saturation missiles. Because of that, he managed to bombard
 > > the shields, weakening them dangerously.
 > > 
 > > Motherload, however, was still behind, not fast enough to engage in
 > > any kind of dogfight, but still armed enough to be left alone for the
 > > moment.
 > > 
 > > Motherload: Is this it, My Lord? Are these all the city's defenses?
 > > Why did you even bother us? I was going to trick them all and win the
 > > jackpot this time!
 > > 
 > > Jotunn: Silence, Motherload. This is only the prelude. You will see
 > > the reason I brought you here soon if Razorwing doesn't do what's
 > > right for everyone.
 > > 
 > > He pressed a button and opened a channel to Relay's command center.
 > > 
 > > Jotunn: Lord Razorwing, this is your last opportunity. You still have
 > > a chance to spare millions of civilians and to keep your valiant
 > > soldiers online. Surrender and we will not harm them.
 > > 
 > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
 > > >
 > > > OOC: No. Once the Predacons arrived Scorponok jumped out to the
 > > surface and transformed to robot mode with Zarak becoming the head.
 > > Woot for me being the first to bring a Headmaster into NBW... I think.
 > > > 
 > > > Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:                                  OOC:
 > > Before I reply, Rick, can you tell me where Scorponok was last
 > > >  time he appeared? Was he still underground?
 > > >  
 > > >  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "khamkain" <khamkain@> wrote:
 > > >  >
 > > >  > ooc: Hi guys, finally back to normal (YAY!) 
 > > >  > 
 > > >  > bic: 
 > > >  > Remus: I'll take to crazy bot, just need is last location!
 > > >  > 
 > > >  > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <warriorazure@> wrote:
 > > >  > >
 > > >  > > Deadfur turned to Remus: What's going on? It's a frickin'
 > > attack, what
 > > >  > > else? We've got us a furious bot down there, trying to blow us
 > > up for
 > > >  > > some reason, and more Preds coming in. Small number of those,
 > mind
 > > >  > > you, but I know Jotunn's not a fool. This means something bad,
 > > but I
 > > >  > > don't know what. So, Remus, pick your target and go!
 > > >  > > 
 > > >  > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <warriorazure@> wrote:
 > > >  > > >
 > > >  > > > ooc: Hi everyone i'm (kham) using my brother's acount unitl
 > some
 > > >  > > > technical problem are fixed.
 > > >  > > > 
 > > >  > > > bic: While Remus was in the CR chamber, he tought about his
 > > >  coming to
 > > >  > > > this planet:to earth. The on thing he couldn`t explain
 was his
 > > >  > > > survival from a crash without any protection other than
 is own
 > > >  body...
 > > >  > > >     on top of that he have no memory of anything that happen
 > > before.
 > > >  > > > Where do he come from? why? Do he have any mission here? 
 > > >  > > > 
 > > >  > > > Has he was thinking, the sound of an attack cut the flow
 of is
 > > >  tough.
 > > >  > > > Eager to go help Deadfur, Remus rushed out of the Building as
 > > >  soon as
 > > >  > > > the CR bipped.
 > > >  > > > 
 > > >  > > > Running toward Deadfur he yelled : DEADFUR! WHAT THE HELL IS
 > > >  GOING ON
 > > >  > > > HERE?
 > > >  > > > 
 > > >  > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@>
 > > wrote:
 > > >  > > > >
 > > >  > > > > ::Scorponok/Zarak::
 > > >  > > > > 
 > > >  > > > > Scorponok is moving about trying to avoid as much damage as
 > > >  possible
 > > >  > > > but was taking shots from the fliers. To protect himself
 > > Scorponok
 > > >  > > > burows into the ground somewhat and shoots another fusion
 blast
 > > >  at the
 > > >  > > > city along with the two rockets he fired.(My last post with
 > him.
 > > >  They
 > > >  > > > should still be in flight.)
 > > >  > > > > 
 > > >  > > > > Scorponok completely burows underground to avoid the "rock
 > > drop"
 > > >  > > > bombs. The ground is being ripped up above him.
 > > >  > > > > 
 > > >  > > > > Zarak has now crawled into a cockpit like part on
 Scorponok.
 > > >  > > > > 
 > > >  > > > > Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:                                 
 > > >  > > > Deadfur: Just great... How about a Minion attack while
 everyone
 > > >  else's
 > > >  > > > >  at it?
 > > >  > > > >  
 > > >  > > > >  He opened the Maximal only frenquency.
 > > >  > > > >  
 > > >  > > > >  Deadfur: Troops, this is Deadfur speaking. We have a
 > report of
 > > >  > > another
 > > >  > > > >  wave of Preds coming in. We have to get rid of that
 > giant bug
 > > >  > before
 > > >  > > > >  they get here, unless some of you can manage to turn
 him the
 > > >  > > other way
 > > >  > > > >  around. For now, continue with hit-and-run. Try to sneak
 > up on
 > > >  > > him and
 > > >  > > > >  to plant some bombs there. Engineering, how's the shield
 > > >  comin' up?
 > > >  > > > >  
 > > >  > > > >  Officer: Slowly, commander. We don't have the city covered
 > > yet,
 > > >  > > but we
 > > >  > > > >  do have defenses over the gravitaion nullifiers. It will
 > take
 > > >  a lot
 > > >  > > > >  before they shoot us down from the skies.
 > > >  > > > >  
 > > >  > > > >  Deafur: Good, keep working on it. Keep up the efforts,
 > > soldiers!
 > > >  > > > >  
 > > >  > > > >  The small fliers were buzzing quickly around Skorponok,
 > > >  > strafing him
 > > >  > > > >  with lasers and missiles, while higher up, a team was
 > trying a
 > > >  > "rock
 > > >  > > > >  drop" technique. They were miles high above the
 > Decepticon and
 > > >  > > > >  dropping small but heavy bombs that would generate a
 bigger
 > > >  impact
 > > >  > > > >  because of the altitude...
 > > >  > > > >  
 > > >  > > > >  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen
 <roborick007@>
 > > >  wrote:
 > > >  > > > >  >
 > > >  > > > >  > ::Lord Elder::
 > > >  > > > >  > 
 > > >  > > > >  > Elder thinks over this change in events before opening a
 > > return
 > > >  > > > >  channel to Deadfur.
 > > >  > > > >  > 
 > > >  > > > >  > Elder: You're not going to like it. I'm showing what
 > > appears to
 > > >  > > be a
 > > >  > > > >  whole squadren of fliers and probably more coming your
 way.
 > > >  > Since you
 > > >  > > > >  are on site and assisting the Maximals I'm scrapping
 the 'no
 > > >  > > > >  interference' order. I'm on my way and I'll try and get as
 > > much
 > > >  > back
 > > >  > > > >  up as possible.
 > > >  > > > >  > 
 > > >  > > > >  > Elder switches to an open Watcher channel.
 > > >  > > > >  > 
 > > >  > > > >  > Elder: Watchers, this is Lord Elder. One of our ranks is
 > > >  > directing
 > > >  > > > >  the defense of the Maximal City Relay. They are faced
 with a
 > > >  > > > >  Decepticon attack and a coming Predacon assualt. They
 are to
 > > >  > recieve
 > > >  > > > >  are full aid. I'm going there myself. Elder out.
 > > >  > > > >  > 
 > > >  > > > >  > He closes communications and heads for the exit. Only
 > > >  > Watchers know
 > > >  > > > >  how to survive the harsh lands around their base. Avoid
 > them.
 > > >  > > > >  > 
 > > >  > > > >  > Elder leaves Cryonosis in a small shuttle pod that
 > will get
 > > >  > him to
 > > >  > > > >  the main land.
 > > >  > > > >  > 
 > > >  > > > >  > Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:                           
 >      
 > > >  > > > >  Deadfur got the message on the Watchers-only frequency.
 > He was
 > > >  > > not too
 > > >  > > > >  >  pleased with the news. As soon as he could, he opened a
 > > line
 > > >  > with
 > > >  > > > >  >  Cryonosis.
 > > >  > > > >  >  
 > > >  > > > >  >  Deadfur: Deadfur reporting. I'm assisting the Maxies in
 > > Relay
 > > >  > > as per
 > > >  > > > >  >  emergency protocols and I'm directing the defenses
 > against
 > > >  that
 > > >  > > > brute.
 > > >  > > > >  >  I require further instructions and backups, my Lord.
 > > Oh, and
 > > >  > > > just how
 > > >  > > > >  >  large is that coming Pred force?
 > > >  > > > >  >  
 > > >  > > > >  >  He ducked as something blew up nearby.
 > > >  > > > >  >  
 > > >  > > > >  >  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen
 > <roborick007@>
 > > >  > wrote:
 > > >  > > > >  >  >
 > > >  > > > >  >  > ::Lord Elder::
 > > >  > > > >  >  > 
 > > >  > > > >  >  > Deep within The Watcher headquarters signals go off,
 > > >  > waking the
 > > >  > > > >  >  Watcher leader.
 > > >  > > > >  >  > 
 > > >  > > > >  >  > Elder: What in the hell?
 > > >  > > > >  >  > 
 > > >  > > > >  >  > He checks the monitoring systems that The
 Watchers have
 > > >  set up
 > > >  > > > >  >  around the planet.
 > > >  > > > >  >  > 
 > > >  > > > >  >  > Elder: One of the Predacon camps looks like their
 > > >  > mobalizing to
 > > >  > > > >  >  attack Relay. Wonderful. Sometimes I think The
 > Minions are
 > > >  > > easier to
 > > >  > > > >  >  deal... What's this?
 > > >  > > > >  >  > 
 > > >  > > > >  >  > Elder locks onto a new signature.
 > > >  > > > >  >  > 
 > > >  > > > >  >  > Elder: It's Decepticon, but not a normal Con signal.
 > > >  Something
 > > >  > > > new.
 > > >  > > > >  >  Something different.
 > > >  > > > >  >  > 
 > > >  > > > >  >  > He opens a comm to his men.
 > > >  > > > >  >  > 
 > > >  > > > >  >  > Elder: Watchers: I believe a new twist in these Beast
 > > >  Wars has
 > > >  > > > >  >  happened. I want Watchers at Relay ASAP. Do not get
 > > involved
 > > >  > > > unless I
 > > >  > > > >  >  order it but I want to study the battle there. Right
 > > now the
 > > >  > > Silver
 > > >  > > > >  >  Wing Maximals are dealing with some kind of new
 > Decepticon
 > > >  > but it
 > > >  > > > >  >  appears that Predacons are moving to attack as well.
 > Elder
 > > >  out.
